p: When NH 4OH was used to precipitate iron impurities, as proposed by Zheng et al., amorphous hydrated iron phosphate, FePO 4Â· xH 2O, was obtained [ 93], which could be restored as olivine FePO 4 after carbothermal treatment. After Li 2CO 3 was recovered from the purified liquor, Zheng et al. resynthesized LFP-C from both precipitates via reducing sintering. The resulting active material provided the capacities of 152 and 138 mAh/g at 0.2 and 1 C, respectively [ 93].
